channel.title: Skills on SnowForlio
channel.description: Recent content in Skills on SnowForlio

item.title: Angular
item.description: The following lesson explains some of the most common hacking techniques and how to secure your app against them. 1. Zero-day Vulnerability A zero-day vulnerability is a weakness that is unknown or unfixed as of today. When a hacker decides to attack this weakness, it’s called zero-day exploit.
